{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16509v1", "title": "Solvability of the ${\rm SK}_1$-analog of the orthogonal groups", "summary": "We prove the dilation principle for the relative Dickson-Siegel-Eichler-Roy
(DSER) elementary orthogonal group and using the dilation principle we prove
the Quillen's analog of the local-global principle for the group. Applying the
relative local-global principle, we prove the solvability and nilpotency of the
${\rm SK_1}$-analog of the orthogonal groups and study the homotopy and
commutativity principle for odd elementary orthogonal groups.", "main_category": "math.KT", "categories": "math.KT", "published": "2025-04-23T08:36:07Z"}
